event.title: was burnt at the stake in Yara, on February 2, 1512

data.event: The Ta√≠no Cacique (chief) Hatuey was burnt at the stake in Yara, on February 2, 1512, after he organized a guerrilla war against the Spaniards.

event.title: the beginning of the Ten Years

data.event: On October 10, 1868, the beginning of the Ten Years' War in Cuba occurred and is known as El Grito de Yara (The Cry of Yara) and was the beginning of the First Cuban War of Independence.

event.title: was established as a municipality in 1912

data.event: Yara was established as a municipality in 1912, when Manzanillo was split up.
